mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer(custno, id, passwd, cname,nickname,phone,zipcode,address1, address2, sns, grade, gender,image,reg_date) VALUES (customer_seq.nextval, #{id}, #{passwd}, #{cname}, #{nickname}, #{phone}, #{zipcode}, #{address1}, #{address2}, #{sns}, #{grade}, #{gender} , #{image}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT custno, id, passwd, cname, phone, address1, address2, reg_date, grade FROM customer ORDER BY grade ASC, id ASC
mapper.delete: update customer set grade=99 WHERE custno=#{custno}
